treasury_media.title: Budweiser - The World Is Yours to Take: BUDX Doha 2022
treasury_media.description: A winning hattrick of experience, strategy and content. WINK helped Budweiser take over the 2022 FIFA World Cup with an integrated global effort that leveraged music and fan culture to become the #1 most talked about brand of the tournament.

treasury_media.title: Faberyayo ft. Karvan Cévitam - Limonade
treasury_media.description: WINK teamed up with darling Dutch artist Faberyayo to make an earworm of a song alongside a music video about Karvan Cévitam's delicious Limonade: the tastiest drink 'op aarde'.

treasury_media.title: Bud Light Seltzer Sessions
treasury_media.description: Bud Light Seltzer commissioned WINK to conceptualize and execute its first-ever live version of the Bud Light Seltzer Sessions. A full-scale IRL experience that tours along with five summer music festivals in the USA. Blasting off at Lollapalooza & Life is beautiful.

treasury_media.title: Bud Dream Bottle
treasury_media.description: Who is brave enough to open up and share their dream with the world? Using personalization as scale, we came up with the idea of a customizable dream bottle as a vehicle for dreams to be shared and claimed by the gutsy Bud fan.

treasury_media.title: Smooth Taste New Crate
treasury_media.description: ‘s Werelds eerste Bud krat, nu met limited edition cover art. Op uitnodiging van Bud heeft Moco Museum 5 Nederlandse kunstenaars gecureerd voor de lancering van de Bud Crate Cover Art. Samen met dit talent introduceren we een nieuw canvas aan het grote publiek. Alle Crate Cover kunstwerken zijn exclusief voor Bud gemaakt en beschikbaar in gelimiteerde oplage. Nu verkrijgbaar bij elk krat Bud.

treasury_media.title: The North Face - Pinnacle Project
treasury_media.description: Located in the Italian Alps and reachable only on foot, fearless explorers have the chance to see and feel The North Face Athlete Archives. Voted best brand activation of 2018 by Adformatie.

treasury_media.title: Budweiser - BUDX Miami
treasury_media.description: Budweiser went all out for Super Bowl LIV in Miami, producing AB InBev’s biggest integrated marketing & influencer program in history.

treasury_media.title: Bud presents: BUDX Tom de Regt
treasury_media.description: Bud heeft samen met Tom de Regt, voormalig grafisch ontwerper van Yellow Claw en Daily Paper, de Bud Beanie ontworpen. Want Kings don’t wear crowns. Koop nu 2 6-packs Bud bij jou in de supermarkt en ontvang de BUDX Tom de Regt Beanie.

treasury_media.title: Budweiser Rewind - Black Eyed Peas - Live from LA
treasury_media.description:
A Reel to Real Series.  Hits, exclusives & good stories. Budweiser Rewind brings the music you love and stories you’ve never heard. A unique interactive music and storytelling series, streaming live to fans around the world. 

Rewind to the full live show here: https://www.facebook.com/watch/live/?v=285210679544575&ref=watch_permalink

treasury_media.title: Budweiser - BUDX Amsterdam
treasury_media.description: BUDX Amsterdam: 2 days of music, art, fashion, talks, masterclasses and more. We coloured temp. red and filled it with culturally relevant panels by day and stellar performances that crossed musical genres by night. Add an installation by Nick Verstand & Salvador Breed, a capsule collection launch by The New Originals, a sneak preview into the DJ Faces by Joss Kottmann and a live a/v performance by Raito. x Boris Acket custom and tailor-made for the main room. Bud is definitely here.

projects.title: 2030 Yacht Concept, Rimore
projects.description:
Every year, Feadship invites a group of ambitious students to create a design in parallel with the Feadship Future Concept and the result is the 40-meter high Rimore, the first superyacht concept ever that translates a break-through mindshift into form, function and design.
Rimore imposes a different attitude towards yachting and wealth; an attitude that is trying to move away from vulgar, brash vessels covered in gold, towards a change in state of mind that goes hand in hand with quality and simplicity. Dutch designers Wouter Struijk, Robert Hooft, Melvin Zaaijer, Wouter Alberda en Gijs van Willigen designed a privately owned research yacht that embodies the combination of leisure and (deep) sea exploration; a carefree quest for new life below.

projects.title: Easywalker - New Product Commercialisation: Social Media Strategy for Europe
projects.description: Product developers need to think on how to introduce their new product in the market. However, before decisions can be made, an analysis of the market, competitors and customers, is necessary to determine the scope of the decisions. A brand new perspective; the social media strategy for the introduction of June, the new Easywalker stroller model, is designed for Europe.

profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern

profile_positions.description:
We are a full service experiential marketing agency operating globally from Amsterdam. We call ourselves experience architects and tactile storytellers, we design and produce made-to-measure 360º 'live' experiences, events and environments, touching and connecting people and brands for over 20 years. Memorable and shareable experiences that cut through the noise, capture the imagination and result in a real connection with the brand and its target audience, ultimately delivering commercial return. Our services include ao. brand events, shows, parties, retail and booth design, brand activations, festivals, trade shows, product presentations, experiential campaigns and toolkits to help solidifying and amplifying all this on a larger scale.

Our game is to celebrate life, bring rapture and make the world all right for a while. 
In an increasingly virtual society people develop a growing need for live-events. Experiences make life real; memories are more valuable than things. The current generation writes their own story by sharing their on- and offline experiences. Opening people up to an attractive state of anything can happen, we supercharge them with unforgettable experiences and lasting impressions. We deliver made-to-measure concepts, always with the customer journey at the heart, and a content strategy in mind. Your brand is our biggest inspiration to create real memorable moments. 

‘The aim of the game is to feel real good!’

See more at www.welcometowink.com
profile_positions.title: Sr. Art Director

profile_positions.description:
Kumpany is a not so ordinary brand activation agency. Always creative and refreshing, telling stories and creating experiences people like to join and share. Thinking & working through the line from below to above. Using & combining all kinds of tools such as online, social media, live events, pr, dm, print, radio & tv in 360-degree campaigns.

Working commissioned for brands such as Ben, BNN, Bavaria, Ziggo, Coca-Cola, WE, LOI, Bacardi, SEAT, Delta Lloyd, Randstad, NU, Eneco, Samsung, NS, T-Mobile, Staatsloterij, Microsoft, Jeugdsportfonds, Sanoma, NOC*NSF, Radio 538, Rabobank.
